name: Bospop

config_properties.name: Bospop
config_properties.description: A classic rock and pop festival in Weert, Netherlands, held annually since 1981.

ai_profile:
**Bospop 2026: A Celebration of Rock’s Diversity and Roots**  

Bospop 2026 boasts an exciting lineup of 39 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of rock and its many subgenres. With rock as the festival’s heartbeat (15 acts), fans can also enjoy flavors of blues rock, alternative rock, indie rock, and hard rock, alongside niche styles like symphonic metal, gothic metal, and even comedy rock. The festival’s genre diversity ensures something for every music enthusiast, from soulful blues to electrifying techno and Celtic punk.  

The festival reflects a strong international presence, with artists hailing from the USA (10 acts), the Netherlands (6), the UK (6), and Belgium (4), among others. Though the lineup features a majority of male artists (27), there is room for greater gender representation, with five female artists, one mixed-gender act, and some with unconfirmed gender identities. Similarly, while four artists are confirmed as people of color, there is potential for more diversity in future editions.  

With an average rating of 8.16 from attendees who rated 82.1% of the lineup, Bospop 2026 promises a high-quality experience. The majority of rated acts scored between 8 and 10, signaling strong anticipation and appreciation for the talent on display. While Spotify links are absent for this year’s lineup, the festival’s eclectic mix of genres and global representation ensures an unforgettable weekend for music lovers.
